action.name: Execute JS code
Execute JS code

sub-events.comment: not emtpy and not a comment
escape = if it's in a value
== section is an array (values with no keys)
section is an array containing objects
move values from "global" into a global scope
write global scope first, since it's on top
using a pre-release when release is available
round a float down to X decimal points
wrap a number (0) between min (1) and max (2)
get unix timestamp (in seconds or milliseconds)

action.name: Set return value
Set return value

sub-events.comment: 2 - play from SFX folder and loop
1 - load a single track from Music

action.name: Set text
action.param: "looks like something went wrong"& newline& newline&"current menu: "&Var_Game.CurrentMenu

sub-events.comment: increase by 5% (2.5db intervals out of quietest -50db)
update volume of already playing audio
if last, then remove last that is not best if best then remove both best and last handle ties properly by prioritizing last
otherwise sort through filtered and return a record
